hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$8{:}07$ is $7$ minutes after $8{:}00$. 


[[☃ image 1]]

  

So, we move $7$ tick marks past $8{:}00$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 8:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 9:00. The seventh tick mark after 0 is labeled 8:07. A blue line moves right along the number line from 8:00 to 8:07. !

hints.content:
This number line shows $8{:}07$ graphed:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 8:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 9:00. The seventh tick mark after 0 is labeled A. !

question.content:
**On which number line is $8{:}07$ graphed?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 8:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 9:00.  The seventh tick mark after 0 is labeled A.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/37a7975c188bdd167ccddc135f891d8bfa3f71eb)
